page.title: 14ADULTS LEISURE TIME
page.content: With the working day becoming shorter people in 1985 have time to devote to leisure activities. Many people in this area participate in organised sport such as football, cricket,stoolball,tennis,squash and badminton.Many take part in water sports at the weekend down on the coast.There are many delightful walks and many local inhabitants spend their time on the footpaths watching changes each season brings.Horseriding is very popular in this area with many people owning horses,stables and paddocks. Much leisure time is spent by adults in local clubs or pubs drinking and playing cards,bingo,snooker,pool and darts.Many hours are spent in watching television and gardening.Craft activities such as knitting,sewing, tatting,crochet,embroidery,corn dolly making,macrame and woodwork are done.
